Server.title: Custom lookup server
Server.description: Lookups will be made using HTTPS:443 against the given server. Target must be reachable with a valid certificate.

DisableServerFallback.title: Disalbe server fallback
DisableServerFallback.description: Disable fallback to upstream servers if custom server isn't reachable. Do not use this function if your server is only reachable internally.

Secret.title: Connection secret
Secret.description: If your server is publicy reachable, you can restrict answers to users which provide this secret to your server.

DisableCrashReports.title: Disable submission of crash reports
DisableCrashReports.description: Forces the extension to disable crash reports. When used the user can't turn reports back on.
